name: Moonlit Hours [Demo]
description:
Moonlight Hours, developed for 2019 NaNoRenO Game Jam, is a silly exploration of what it means to be forced to take gen-eds in college and procrastinate the shit out of them. 

The protagonist, Jolene Phan, is doing exactly that, gathering research for a gen-ed at a local Museum, and you the player must make sure her paper turns out well.

Follow her journey throughout the Museum and meet the wacky characters she's forced to interact with.

Character Sprites and UI Art done by @piropoi
Background Art done by @OceanAlchemist
Music done by @miles_logan_and @coolcvt
Programming done by @gensuta
Writing done by @kirij0

There are a couple of bugs in this demo and if you find any let us know!
( The load feature doesn't work, but the demo is relatively short! )
